Verses: 1 avargal Janangaludane Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Aasaariyargalum Dhevaalayaththuch Senaiththalaivanum Sadhuseyarum Avargalidaththil Vandhu,
2 avargal Janangalukku Ubadhesikkiradhinaalum, Yesuvai Munnittu, Mariththorilirundhu Uyirththezhudhalaip Pirasangikkiradhinaalum, Sinankondu,
3 avargalaip Pidiththu, Saayangaalamaayirundhapadiyinaal, Marunaalvaraikkum Kaavalil Vaiththaargal.
4 vasanaththaik Kettavargalil Anegar Visuvaasiththaargal; Avargal Thogai Erakkuraiya Aiyaayiramaayirundhadhu.
5 marunaalile Janangaludaiya Adhigaarigalum Moopparum Vedhapaaragarum,
6 piradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Annaavum, Kaaibaavum, Yovaanum, Aleksandharum, Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Kudumbaththaar Yaavarum Erusalemile Koottankoodi,
7 avargalai Naduve Niruththi: Neengal Endha Vallamaiyinaale, Endha Naamaththinaale, Idhaich Seydheergal Endru Kettaargal.
8 appozhudhu Pedhuru Parisuththa Aaviyile Niraindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Janaththin Adhigaarigale, Isravelin Mooppargale,
9 piniyaaliyaayirundha Indha Manushanukkuch Seyyappatta Ubagaaraththaikkuriththu Edhinaale Ivan Aarokkiyamaanaanendru Neengal Indru Engalidaththil Visaariththukkettaal,

10 ungalaal Siluvaiyil Araiyappattavarum, Dhevanaal Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppappattavarumaayirukkira Nasareyanaagiya Yesukiristhuvin Naamaththinaaleye Ivan Ungalukku Munbaakach Sosthamaai Nirkiraanendru Ungalukkum, Isravel Janangalellaarukkum Therindhirukkakkadavadhu.
11 veedu Kattugiravargalaagiya Ungalaal Arpamaai Ennappatta Avare Moolaikkuth Thalaikkallaanavar.
12 avaraaleyandri Veroruvaraalum Ratchippu Illai; Naam Ratchikkappadumpadikku Vaanaththin Keezhengum, Manushargalukkulle Avarudaiya Naamameyallaamal Veroru Naamam Kattalaiyidappadavum Illai Endraan.

13 pedhuruvum Yovaanum Pesugira Dhairiyaththai Avargal Kandu, Avargal Padippariyaadhavargalendrum Pedhamaiyullavargalendrum Arindhapadiyinaal Aachchariyappattu, Avargal Yesuvudanekooda Irundhavargalendrum Arindhukondaargal.
14 sosthamaakkappatta Manushan Avargal Aruge Nirkiradhaik Kandapadiyaal, Edhirpesa Avargalukku Idamillaadhirundhadhu.
15 appozhudhu Avargalai Aalosanai Sangaththai Vittu Veliye Pogumpadi Kattalaiyittu, Thangalukkulle Yosanaipannikkondu:
16 indha Manusharai Naam Enna Seyyalaam? Erusalemil Vaasampannugira Ellaarukkum Therindhirukkirapadi Veliyarangamaana Arpudham Ivargalaal Seyyappattadhe, Adhai Naam Illaiyendru Sollakkoodaadhu.
17 aagilum Idhu Adhigamaai Janaththukkulle Parambaadhapadikku, Idhumudhal Oruvarodum Indha Naamaththaikkuriththup Pesakkoodaadhendru Avargalai Urudhiyaaip Bayamuruththa Vendumendru Sollikkondu,
18 avargalai Azhaiththu: Yesuvin Naamaththaikkuriththu Evvalavum Pesavum Podhikkavum Koodaadhendru Avargalukku Kattalaiyittaargal.

19 pedhuruvum Yovaanum Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Dhevanukkuch Sevikodukkiradhaippaarkkilum Ungalukkuch Sevikodukkiradhu Dhevanukku Munbaaga Niyaayamaayirukkumo Neengale Nidhaaniththuppaarungal.
20 naangal Kandavaigalaiyum Kettavaigalaiyum Pesaamalirukkakkoodaadhe Endraargal.
21 nadandha Sangadhigalaikkuriththu Ellaarum Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinapadiyaal, Janangalukkup Bayandhu Avargalai Dhandikka Vagaiyondrunkaanaamal, Avargalaip Bayamuruththi Vittuvittaargal.
22 arpudhamaaich Sosthamaakkappatta Manushan Naarpadhu Vayadhukku Merpattavanaayirundhaan.
23 avargal Vidudhalaiyaakkappattapinbu, Thangalaich Serndhavargalidaththil Vandhu, Piradhaana Aasaariyargalum Mooppargalum Thangalukkuch Sonna Yaavaiyum Ariviththaargal.
24 avargal Adhaik Kettu, Orumanappattu Dhevanai Nokkich Saththamittu: Karththaave, Neer Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Avaigalilulla Yaavatraiyum Undaakkina Dhevanaayirukkireer.
25 purajaadhigal Kondhaliththu, Janangal Virudhaa Kaariyangalaich Sindhippaanen Endrum,

26 karththarukku Virodhamaagavum, Avarudaiya Kiristhuvukku Virodhamaagavum Boomiyin Raajaakkal Ezhumbi Nindru, Adhigaarigal Egamaaik Koottankoodinaargal Endrum Dhevareer Ummudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Thaaveedhin Vaakkinaal Uraiththeere.
27 andhappadi Ummudaiya Karamum Ummudaiya Aalosanaiyum Mun Kuriththavaigal Yaavaiyum Seyyumpadi,
28 erodhum Pondhiyupilaaththum, Purajaadhigalodum Isravel Janangalodunkooda, Neer Abishegampannina Ummudaiya Parisuththa Pillaiyaagiya Yesuvukku Virodhamaai, Meyyaagave Koottankoodinaargal.
29 ippozhudhum, Karththaave Avargal Bayamuruththalgalai Dhevareer Gavaniththu,

30 ummudaiya Parisuththa Pillaiyaagiya Yesuvin Naamaththinaale Adaiyaalangalum Arpudhangalum Nadakkumpadi Seydhu, Piniyaaligalaik Gunamaakkumpadi Ummudaiya Karaththai Neetti, Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Ummudaiya Vasanaththai Muzhudhairiyaththodum Sollumpadi Avargalukku Anukgiraganjseydharulum Endraargal.
31 avargal Jebampanninapodhu, Avargal Koodiyirundha Idam Asaindhadhu. Avargalellaarum Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Nirappappattu, Dhevavasanaththaith Dhairiyamaaich Sonnaargal.

32 visuvaasigalaagiya Thiralaana Koottaththaar Ore Irudhayamum Ore Manamumullavargalaayirundhaargal. Oruvanaagilum Thanakkullavaigalil Ondraiyum Thannudaiyadhendru Sollavillai; Sagalamum Avargalukkup Podhuvaayirundhadhu.
33 karththaraagiya Yesuvin Uyirththezhudhalaikkuriththu Apposthalar Migundha Balamaaich Saatchikoduththaargal; Avargalellaarmelum Poorana Kirubai Undaayirundhadhu.
34 nilangalaiyum Veedugalaiyum Udaiyavargal Avaigalai Vitru, Virkappattavaigalin Kirayaththaik Konduvandhu,
35 apposthalarudaiya Paadhaththil Vaiththaargal. Avanavanukkuth Thevaiyaanadharkuththakkadhaaip Pagirndhukodukkappattadhu; Avargalil Oruvanukkum Ondrum Kuraivaayirundhadhillai.
36 seeppurutheevaanum Leviyanum Apposthalaraale Aarudhalin Magan Endru Arththankollum Barnabaa Ennum Maruperpetravanumaagiya Yose Enbavan,
37 thanakku Undaayirundha Nilaththaivitru, Adhin Kirayaththaik Konduvandhu, Apposthalarudaiya Paadhaththile Vaiththaan.
